summary: A detective embarks on a mission to track down a woman in L.A.'s seedy nightclubs, only to come face-to-face with a blood-thirsty cult of lethally beautiful prostitutes. Is he the next victim of Hollywood's demented Chainsaw Hookers?
cast: Gunnar Hansen|Linnea Quigley|John Henry Richardson|Dawn Wildsmith|Michelle Bauer|Esther Elise|Tricia Burns|Fox Harris|Jimmy Williams|Michael Sonye|Dennis T. Mooney|Jerry Miller|Steve Welles|Charles O'Hair|Susie Wilson|Gary J. Levinson|Jeffrey Hill|Gerry Jenkins|Sandy Palm|Christopher Ray
title: Hollywood Chainsaw Hookers
